_source.short_desc: Text marketing software that offers automatic billing, text message scheduler, auto-responders, and free inbound messages.
_source.long_desc: LOWEST PRICE SMS!!! FREE 15 Day Trial - Text marketing & bulk sms software that offers text message scheduler, auto-responders, inbox, contact import, unlimited contacts & groups, QR codes, and free inbound messages. TXT180 offers an easy way to send group text messages for any type of business or organization such as restaurants, retail, churches, real estate, fundraisers, and more.
_source.pricing_details:
Free 15 Day Trial includes 100 messages and keyword.

Message Plans:

500 messages: $14.95 per month billed annually, or $19.95 month-to-month with up to 100,000 messages. 

Prices vary by plan.
_source.target_audience: We offer services to all sizes of businesses that need sms marketing. We love to help small business owners use text messaging to reach their loyal customer base with our industry lowest pricing.
